text: (Aur woh waqiya bhi qabil e zikar hai) jab hum Jinno ke ek girooh ko tumhari taraf le aaye thay taa-ke Quran sunein. Jab woh us jagaah pahunche (jahan tum Quraan padh rahe thay) to unhon ne aapas mein kaha khamosh ho jao, phir jab woh padha ja chukka to woh khabardar karne walay ban kar apni qaum ki taraf palte(returned)
